## HttpDuplex.url property

Request URL string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get url(): string | undefined;
```

## Example 1

<caption>A request made as:</caption> GET /info?check=none HTTP/1.1

## Example 2

<caption>Will return the string</caption> '/info?check=none'
